mapper.sql: a.category_id AS categoryId, a.category_name AS categoryName, a.parent_id AS parentId, a.is_parent AS isParent, IFNULL(b.category_id,'0') AS "parent.category_id", IFNULL(b.category_name,'/') AS "parent.category_name"
LEFT JOIN category AS b ON a.parent_id = b.category_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.category_id As categoryId, a.category_name As categoryName, a.parent_id As parentId, a.is_parent As isParent, IFNULL(b.category_id,'0') As "parent.categoryId", IFNULL(b.category_name,'/') As "parent.categoryName" FROM category AS a LEFT JOIN category AS b ON a.parent_id = b.category_id ORDER BY a.parent_id ASC, a.is_parent ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_content_category ( parent_id, name, status, sort_order, is_parent, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{parent.id}, #{name}, #{status}, #{sortOrder}, #{isParent}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_content_category SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, name = #{name}, status = #{status}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, is_parent = #{isParent}, created = #{created}, updated = #{updated} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE a, b FROM tb_content_category AS a LEFT JOIN tb_content_category b ON a.id = b.parent_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
